newsitem.title: UK: OPEC Jan output 25.38 million bpd, members say.
newsitem.headline: OPEC Jan output 25.38 million bpd, members say.

text.p: OPEC pumped 25.38 million barrels a day (bpd) in January, up from 24.98 million in December, a monthly report from OPEC's Vienna-based secretariat said.
By comparison, a Reuters survey put OPEC output at 26.64 million barrels a day (bpd). The 11-member group has an official ceiling of 25.033 million bpd.
The secretariat report projected world demand for crude this year at 70.92 million barrels a day (bpd), up 80,000 bpd from the previous report.
It put the likely call on OPEC crude this year at 25.2 million bpd.
